description: This is the Beyond All Legend Approved Wishlist
name: BAL Wishlist

data.description: The roll for forbearance.
The perk set for forbearance
Possible other perk combos for this gun

Other Fun Perk Combos
Best gun in the game No cap

Wellspring allows for great ability regen, being on a wave frame, and column 4 is mostly up to preference. Repulsor Brace offers more survivability for void builds but Destabilizing Rounds are great for ad clear
Other Variations for if you don't want to use Wellspring

Wellspring allows for great ability regen, being on a wave frame, and column 4 is mostly up to preference. Repulsor Brace offers more survivability for void builds but Destabilizing Rounds are great for ad clear
For if you don't want to run Wellspring
Demo + Adrenaline offers a fantastic add-clear combo for grenade spam & high damage, but redirection also offers more consistent chunking on any majors you also happen to hit
Demo + Adrenaline offers a fantastic add-clear combo for grenade spam & high damage, but redirection also offers more consistent chunking on any majors you also happen to hit
While this can fit the same niche as Explosive Personality, the other GL is easier to obtain and is craftable, so sticking with its niche of voltshot on a wave frame would be best
Perfect for Voltshot but other rolls wishlist are good too
While this can fit the same niche as Explosive Personality, the other GL is easier to obtain and is craftable, so sticking with it's niche of voltshot on a wave frame would be best
Stats for All and One for All are the obvious combo, although others could be serviceable
Stats for All and One for all are the obvious combo, although others could be serviceable
Void blinding GL, kinetic damage boost from DB
Void blinding GL, kinetic damage boost from DB
Solar surge matching swap damage OR blinding GL

Craftable energy blinding GL can roll voltshot for overload stuns but no auto loading or ambitious. Column 3 is mostly a wash so just use the obvious slightly better perks, voltshot will be best in column 4
Column 3 is mostly a wash so just use the obvious slightly better perks, voltshot will be best in column 4

This is a perfect roll for if you want to treat your mountaintop as a primary weapon where you shoot into a group of ads for a kill to proc ambitious and also proc One For All for damage boost.
Roll for using Mountain Top as more of an ad-clear weapon where you proc ambitious for 2 rounds in the mag and One For All for damage. Aim to get hard launch and Spike/Implosion for perfect roll.

This is a perfect roll for dealing a huge chunk of damage to champs and other high-health enemies. You will want to build of recombination and by the time you have it ready auto-loading should have it loaded

Roll for taking a chunk out of Champs and other high-health enemies. Build up recombination then chunk them down while switching back to primary or heavy, auto-loading will have it ready for you the next time you need it.

Hung jury is a pick-your-own-adventure weapon as you can pair Kinetic Tremors with pretty much anything. I would recommend One For All but Explosive and FireFly Work too.

Hands down the highest DPS sword if you can get frenzy and surrounded procked the entire time. Otherwise, just use a better sword (Bequest).
Only keep if you don't have a bequest. This weapon can only beat it in very specific circumstances and if it is a perfect god roll.

DPS build for Edge Transit. This roll is only for damage and not meant for adclear but with it being A GL you can easily use it for adclear in a pinch. (Not the perfect god roll would be a shiny that has Envious so you can swap from Envious to Cascade for damage)

DPS build for Edge Transit. This roll is only for damage and not meant for adclear but with it being A GL you can easily use it for adclear in a pinch. (Not the perfect god roll would be a shiny that has Envious so you can swap from Envious to Cascade for damage)

Wilderflight is currently the best special GL for boss damage due to being a doublefire GL, and having access to auto-loading, unlike Wildstyle. Its most applicable use case is swap dps load-outs, or for proccing bait and switch.

Wilderflight is currently the best special GL for boss damage due to being a doublefire GL, and having access to auto-loading, unlike Wildstyle. Its most applicable use case is swap dps load-outs, or for proccing bait and switch.
Demolitionist roll for nade builds but there is better if you want it for its best role which is boss damage

The OG top dawg, great for both add clear and damage.

This weapon straight-up feels amazing to use and does fantastic damage. Perfect weapon for chunking majors, taking out shields, or just general add clear while being very ammo efficient with Lead from Gold making it a must-have for double special

WILK: Just a worse Imminence so not much to say. Has a lot going for it for a melee build but otherwise a let down. Feel free to just dismantle unless you don't have an Imminence || GINGER: Being an adaptive frame, Mirror Imago doesn't have the movement bonus that Lightweights benefit from (Imminence from SE), and it also has a slightly different damage profile despite being the same RPM (more on body, less on criit). Mirror Imago has the upper hand with access to Runneth Over as a shiny, but it's mostly personal preference and availability between this and Imminence, it's only competition.

GINGER: Strand Glaive! Yippee! Also, it has some really interesting perks! Discord in the third column will pull ammo out of thin air for every kill you get after swapping to this after landing a kill with another weapon, and Beacon Rounds in the fourth column will give your bullets tracking after every final blow. Overall  a fun weapon, highly reccomend grabbing a copy or two.
